item.title: 24.4 release notes
item.description: After a long time without release, we are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 24.4, which now supports Java 21.

item.title: 21.11 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 21.11 «Zinnia».

item.title: 21.7 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 21.7 «Yucca».

item.title: 21.4 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 21.4 «Xylobium».

item.title: 20.11 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 20.11 «Willow».

item.title: 20.7 release notes
item.description: We skipped the 20.4 version because of the world pandemic impact, but here we are, with the release of SeedStack 20.7 «Violet».

item.title: 19.11 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 19.11 «Tulip».

item.title: 19.7 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 19.7 «Sycamore».

item.title: 19.4 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 19.4 «Rose Lily».

item.title: 18.11 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 18.11 «Quince».

item.title: 18.7 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 18.7 «Petunia».

item.title: 18.4 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 18.4 «Orchid».

item.title: What's new in business framework 4.0 ?
item.description: Business framework 4.x is vastly improved version. DDD specifications, simpler API, powerful pagination, stream-based implementation, …

item.title: 17.11 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 17.11 «Nymphaea». The highlight is a major update to the business framework but it also contains two new add-ons, one being to use Apache Kafka in SeedStack apps.

item.title: IntelliJ IDEA plugin released
item.description: A brand new SeedStack plugin for the popular IDE Intellij IDEA has been released.

item.title: 17.7 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 17.7 «Magnolia». This version focuses on cloud-related capabilities (see AWS Lambda and Consul add-ons below) and much-improved project generation including an optional ready-to-use Docker environment for your Web projects.

item.title: SeedStack wins the OW2 quality award
item.description: The SeedStack project received the OW2 quality award during the 2017 edition of OW2con, the OW2 annual community event.

item.title: 17.4 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 17.4 «Lotus». This is mostly a maintenance release but some new components are provided.

item.title: 16.11.2 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 16.11 «Kiwi». This is a major release bringing new exciting changes such as a cleaner, much more powerful configuration system.

item.title: 16.7 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 16.7 «Jasmine», a maintenance release.

item.title: 16.4 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 16.4, the first major release of 2016. Building on the recently introduced add-on architecture, this releases brings several new components and features. A lot of improvements have also been done under-the-hood to keep SeedStack up-to-date with current technologies and standards.

item.title: 15.11.2 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 15.11.2, the second incremental update of SeedStack 15.11.

item.title: 15.11.1 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 15.11.1, an incremental update of SeedStack 15.11.

item.title: 15.11 release notes
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of SeedStack 15.11, codenamed «Hibiscus». This new version comes with a new add-on architecture and several new features like business framework improvements, a full-featured cryptography module and support for several NoSQL technologies.

item.title: Welcome to SeedStack
item.description: Welcome to SeedStack, an Open-Source enterprise-class development stack for building modern and robust applications. SeedStack has been derived from a PSA Peugeot Citroën internal development stack.
